instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00840: What is 820-00840? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00840</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no output sound, device detected
threads.message:
Greetings, I have this board that has no output from the speakers, however it detects the output device, as well as plays from headphone jack, and recognizes mic input.
It is switching back and forth without issues to speakers/headphones when unplugging the jack.
Tried replacement speakers - no dice.
No visible knocked out components nor liquid damage.

What would be your starting point?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00840</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no output sound, device detected
threads.message:
Volume control bar is active, when pressing the keys?
<SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H_SPKRL</SIGNAL> present?

Do PRAM and SMC reset 2-3 times.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00840</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no output sound, device detected
threads.message: Replaced the main audio chip (<CHIP>U6200</CHIP>) and speaker sound has returned!
